content.rendered:
Collaboration

Work together, better

Help teams work together in today’s remote world by building audio and video collaboration tools right into your app. Foster communication, boost productivity, and ignite innovation.

START BUILDING FOR FREE
Contact sales

Trusted by our customers

Build for teamwork

In today’s digital world, applications and solutions that enable teamwork are more critical than ever. Whether you’re building a digital whiteboard, a visual workspace, or a project management tool, your users deserve a delightful experience built with them in mind.

The Dolby.io Communications APIs include audio and video APIs that support video and voice calls — powered by Dolby.io’s best-in-class Dolby Voice® technology. Build in capabilities including screen and video sharing, file presentation, recording, and so much more. And get started in no time with the Communications UXKit. All platforms, including iOS, Android, Web, and Desktop are supported.

Popular features

Ignite breakthrough ideas

Voice or video chat

Get collaborators and teams talking to each other in real-time with built-in video or voice chat — powered by Dolby.io’s best-in-class Dolby Voice® technology.

Screen sharing

Add screen sharing functionality to boost engagement.

Call recording

Record meetings within your platform, then share them with the team later.

Audio and video download

Download audio-only or video recordings captured in 1080p with Dolby Voice®.

File presentation

Give users the ability to present files and videos within your collaboration platform.

Messaging

Embed chat messaging and features like @mentions and thread replies.

Customer Success

Introducing Quick Talk to elevate your collaboration sessions

“With Dolby.io APIs, collaborators in MURAL can utilize the same technology that powers over 25 billion minutes of conference calls per year for seamless, crystal-clear communications.”
Read More

Box and Dolby transform media in the cloud

New integration provides Box users worldwide access to automated audio enhancement tools powered by industry-defining Dolby technology.
Read More

Introducing EasyWebinar, a versatile webinar platform

EasyWebinar Live engine is powered by Dolby.io. Dolby.io service is encrypted using industry standard protocols.
Read More

Popular use cases

Record important conversations

Webinars and online groups

1:1 and multi-party team calls

Digital whiteboard

Feedback capture in real-time

Team chat and activity feeds

Dolby’s best-in-class technology combined with the Box Content Cloud gives users around the globe access to higher audio quality without adding additional strain to production teams.

Aaron Levie

CEO and Co-Founder, Box

SECURITY

Secure, reliable, and scalable

We remove the complexity of building a communications solution while ensuring security and compliance, including access to a global infrastructure. Dolby.io is GDPR, HIPAA, and SOC-2 compliant.

The Dolby difference

Dolby has revolutionized the science of sight and sound through innovative research and engineering. Right out-of-the-box, your users can experience Dolby-quality sound in your apps through the power of Dolby Voice®. Dolby Voice® is an award-winning audio communications technology backed by decades of expertise in sound signal processing.

Reliable and scalable

Our network resilience and random loss distribution capabilities help to maintain audio quality between users even in the most challenging network conditions. Our mixing solution processes over 15 billion minutes annually with conference providers such as BlueJeans and British Telecom.

Secure and compliant

From encryption and security certification to our commitment to a secure environment, Dolby.io delivers a communication service that you can trust. Dolby.io is GDPR, HIPAA, and SOC-2 compliant.

Explore additional content

In this guide we explore how to algorithmically remaster the 1908 baseball anthem “Take Me Out to …

The Transcode API provides another powerful tool from Dolby.io to help you understand, improve, and distribute media …

A tutorial on how to use the Dolby.io Communications REST API to generate the recordings of your …

Developer Advocate

Get started

Build audio and video tools in your app

No credit card to start. Get a $15 credit just for signing up.

Start building for free Start building for free
Contact sales

Keep a good thing going

Get the latest news, events, and product updates from the Dolby.io team.
